# RemoteKeylessEntryEnduringAction.EnduringExecutionRequest

**Class**

An object that reports the results of an action with an optional stopping point.

## Declaration

```swift
final class EnduringExecutionRequest
```

## Overview

When you perform an action, the system creates a [doc://com.apple.CarKey/documentation/CarKey/RemoteKeylessEntryEnduringAction/EnduringExecutionRequest] object for your request and returns it to your app. Use the object to send a follow-up request to stop the action. You can also use it to determine the status of the original action.

## Getting the Vehicle’s Respose

- **results()**: Returns the results of a preceding action request.
- **ExecutionStatus**: A type that contains the status code a vehicle returns after executing an action.

## Cancelling an Action

- **stop()**: Sends a request to stop a previously started action.
